alert.note: Alert for Goose Creek and Raft River Valley, Southern Sawtooth NF, Twin Falls BLM south of the Snake River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 27 at 1:24PM MDT until August 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 425... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 410... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 427... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 475 AND 476... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 427... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 427 Goose Creek and Raft River Valley/Southern Sawtooth NF/Twin Falls BLM south of the Snake River. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...9 to 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Low humidity and strong wind can mean fast growth or spread rates for wildfires, long range spotting, and other hazards with wildfire activity.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly based on these criteria for Southeastern Idaho: - Relative humidity at or below 15 percent and wind gusts of at least 25 mph in the mountains, or 30 mph in the Snake Plain.

area.areaDesc: Goose Creek and Raft River Valley, Southern Sawtooth NF, Twin Falls BLM south of the Snake River
